explanation: The Modern Slavery Act and other anti-slavery laws require all companies supplying goods and services with a turnover of over Â£36m to ensure greater transparency in their supply chains, make disclosures and set out the steps that they take (including policies, measures and due diligence) to tackle modern slavery.
